custom-action.name: WindowWait - Welcome to Chrome - Google Chrome ...
custom-action.description:
This Action waits for an event (CREATED, ACTIVATED, DESTROYED) for a window with a title (that can be a regexp) and optionally in a certain region of the screen.
Possible parameters are: - windowName (required): Window name, that can be a regexp like "Calculator.*". - windowEvent (required): Event to wait: CREATED, ACTIVATED, DESTROYED. Default value is "ACTIVATED". - windowRect (optional): Region of the window in the format: [poxX,poxY,width,height]. - waitTimeoutInMs (required): Maximum timeout in milliseconds to wait for receiving the right windowEvent, if 0 it will wait infinitely. Default value is "60000".
